page.title: 13Tolworth Recreation Centre
page.content: This recreation centre stands next to my school ( Tolworth Girls School). This is a modern building . It provides us with most of our sports facilities. It has a basketball arena,gym, theatre, buffet and squash courts. Our School also often uses the centre for our assemblies, and we also use it for drama. The public are using the facilities all the time, although most come in the evening after work. Employees of Kingston Borough are allowed free membership. Some of the best basketball teams in the world play here, as Kingston play here and they are one of the leading teams in this country. Discos are held here and the centre is also very popular for its sauna facilities. The centre does not have a swimming pool, the nearest pool is the "Kingfisher" in Kingston. {BY ALEX WILLUMSEN
